          <title>
            <string language="en">The electroscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Elektroskop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'électroscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O electroscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'elettroscopio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Electroscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El electroscopio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how an electroscope works.  Electroscopes are used to detect charges.</string>
          </description>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Elektroskop 
arbeitet. Elektroskope werden benutzt, um Ladungen zu entdecken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment un électroscope
fonctionne. Des électroscopes sont utilisés pour détecter des
frais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um electroscope 
trabalha. Os electroscopes são usados detectar cargas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un elettroscopio
funziona. Gli elettroscopi sono utilizzati per rilevare le 
spese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς electroscope 
λειτουργεί. Electroscopes χρησιμοποιούνται για να 
ανιχνεύσουν τις δαπάνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un electroscopio 
funciona. Los electroscopios se utilizan para detectar cargas.</string>
